Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

This package contains classes related to component validation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NumberValidator.NumberRestriction
    Defines a restriction on a Number.
    Validator
    Defines data validation for a component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractValidator
    Abstract implementation of validator.
    CompositeValidator
    A validator based on the validation of one or more other validator instances.
    DoubleEntryValidator
    Validates DoubleEntryField's fields.
    DoubleRangeValidator
    Validates an text input that it is a valid double and in a range of values.
    DoubleValidator
    Validator for FieldComponents that hold double values.
    EmailValidator
    Validates email in a Field.
    FloatValidator
    Validator for FieldComponents that hold float values.
    IntegerValidator
    Validator for FieldComponents that hold integer values.
    LongRangeValidator
    Validates an text input that it is a valid long and in a range of values.
    LongValidator
    Validator for FieldComponents that hold long values.
    NumberValidator
    Abstract validator for FieldComponents in which a Number is entered.
    PassAllValidator
    A validator instance that always returns valid.
    RegularExpressionValidator
    Validates a component based on a regular expression.
    RequiredValueValidator
    Validates that a value is required.
    StringValueValidator
    A base class for validators that use a String value for validation.
    ValidatorUtil
    Utility class for validation.
    ValidMarkupValidator
    Markup validator that uses a MarkupValidatorClient.
    ValidRegularExpressionValidator
    Validates that the String is a valid RegularExpression.
    ValidURIValidator
    Validates that the String is a valid URI.
    ValidURLValidator
    Validates that the String is a valid URL.
    XMLFragmentMIWTValidator
    Validator for XML fragments.

Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation Description

This package contains classes related to component validation. Validation provides a means to ensure that data entered into a component is valid. Validation may include limiting a Field to a valid numerical value, a North American phone number convention, etc. Use the ComponentImpl.setValidator(Validator) method to set the validator for a component.

The medium layer may provide a level of validation based on the standard validation classes. If you extend a validator do not make it less restrictive than the base class. The ValidatorUtil class may also be used to get a list of failed components in a component tree.
